messages.subject: Re: New College for Homeschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: IMHO, it means being there like a safety net and allowing them to own their own decisions.  It means being a helping hand and a guiding light when needed.
messages.messageBody:
IMHO, it means being there like a safety net and allowing them to "own"
their own decisions. It means being a helping hand and a guiding light
when needed. It means growing a child that is responsible because they
have been responsible for their own education and goals since they were wee
ones even if they didn't realise that is what it was they were doing.

In our house part of that responsibility means if mom paid for it because
you just had to have it, you finish it <g> which comes under the category
of "boundaries," I would think.

Lynda

----------
From: Thad Martin <tmartin@...>

hi,

giving control to your children doesn't mean without boundaries or
control over others. i think this is just a semantics issue not a real
philosophic difference - i maybe wrong.

-susan
austin, tx
'unity through diversity'

are going to be admitted.
--
Thea <metta@...>

messages.subject: Re: New College for Homeschoolers
messages.messageBody:
>Isn't home -unschooling all about giving the kids the
control?<

I hope not, but I do want my kids to take responsibility for their own educations. It's my job to guide and help them to take charge of their own lives, figure out who they are and find their place in this world.

I do agree with you that I don't want any group or organization exerting control over my kids (or me) and telling them what they should do or who they should be. I want my kids to have the freedom to discover themselves - that's what I think unschooling is supposed to be about. Children still have to abide by the standards that individual families uphold and parents have to maintain that delicate balance until thekids are mature enough to do it on their own. Easier said than done - huh? - especially for an unstructured, impulsive person like me! LOL

Betsy Wright

The Wright Way To Homeschool
http://www.angelfire.com/fl3/homeschoolingwrights
email: deejay@...
I can do everything through Him who strengthens me. Phillipians 4:13

messages.subject: Re: New College for Homeschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: yes, this definitely looks like a way to exert more control over your children.  Isn t home -unschooling all about giving the kids the control? Mara
messages.messageBody:
yes, this definitely looks like a way to exert more control over your
children. Isn't home -unschooling all about giving the kids the
control?

Mara
